title: Advent of Code 2025: Number of puzzles reduce from 25 to 12 for the first time
author: vismit2000
aiHeadline: Advent of Code 2025: Organizers finally realize 25 puzzles were way too much, so they're cutting it down to 12—because who needs a month-long challenge when you can just do half of it?

title: You already have a Git server
author: chmaynard
aiHeadline: You already have a Git server: Because apparently, you've been living under a rock and didn't realize that the tool you've been using for years is actually a fully functional Git server just waiting for you to discover it.

title: Let's Help NetBSD Cross the Finish Line Before 2025 Ends
author: jaypatelani
aiHeadline: Let's Help NetBSD Cross the Finish Line Before 2025 Ends: Because clearly, the project has been stuck in development hell for way too long, and the world can't wait another year for it to be 'mostly done.'

title: Pico-Banana-400k
author: dvrp
aiHeadline: Pico-Banana-400k: The latest in tech innovation, brought to you by Apple—because who needs a powerful computer when you can have a banana-themed one?

title: Movie posters from Ghana in the 1980s and 90s
author: bookofjoe
aiHeadline: Movie posters from Ghana in the 1980s and 90s: Because sometimes, the worst movie posters are the ones that are just too good not to share with the world.
